nodes.text: An assault laser cannon was a powerful type of laser cannon sometimes installed on starships. The Wookiee bounty hunter Granakk's YT-1300 light freighter, Reckoning, had a single assault laser cannon installed on it. During the time of the New Republic, Erron Kell's Deathraven was equipped with four assault laser cannons. Additionally, the bounty hunter ship Mist Hunter was equipped with two assault laser cannons.
